title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 603.2 - Redistribution and adjustment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 603.2 - Redistribution and adjustment

State Regulations

Adjustments of claims reflecting revised reimbursement
methodologies must be made using formats approved by the department. Any
information required by the department to properly verify or consider the
adjusted claim must be provided as instructed by the department. Redistribution
and adjustment of claims must be submitted together with the claims to which
the adjustments are applicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
603.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
